Package main.Java.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
main.Java.entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archer, Chaser, Kamikaze, Ogre, Player, Projectile, testNPC
public class Entity extends Thread
Entity The Entity class It is the abstracted class used to create all the entities
